text: Vêtre-sur-Anzon is a commune in the Loire department in central France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Saint- Julien-la-Vêtre (the seat) and Saint-Thurin.Arrêté préfectoral 23 October 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Loire department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Loire (department)
title: Vêtre-sur-Anzon
